#summary VClipse Installation Instructions

= Installing VClipse =

Install any Eclipse Juno 4.2.1 (SR1) distribution.

Install SAP JCo and the SAP Java IDoc library, e.g. using the method described in [BuildingVClipse Building VClipse].

Install Subclipse from http://subclipse.tigris.org/update_1.8.x

Intall VClipse from http://update.vclipse.org
